extends Object

This class represents a project.

addNode

public ProjectNode addNode(ProjectNode parent,
                           ProjectNode node)
Adds the given node to the project.

If a node with the same file id already exists, the node is not added and the existing node is returned. However, the 'project node added' event is still fired.

Parameters:
parent - parent node of node to be added
node - node to be added
Returns:
the node that was added, or the existing node with the same file id

deleteNode

public void deleteNode(ProjectNode node)
Deletes the given node from the project.

Parameters:
node - node to be deleted

addProjectChangeListener

Adds a ProjectChangeListener to the listener list.

Parameters:
listener - the ProjectChangeListener to be added

removeProjectChangeListener

public void removeProjectChangeListener(ProjectChangeListener listener)
Removes a ProjectChangeListener from the listener list.

Parameters:
listener - the ProjectChangeListener to be removed
